DCollapsibleCategory/GetExpanded.description: Returns whether the DCollapsibleCategory is expanded or not.

DCollapsibleCategory/SetAnimTime.description: Sets the time in seconds it takes to expand the DCollapsibleCategory

DCollapsibleCategory/SetContents.description: Sets the contents of the DCollapsibleCategory.

DCollapsibleCategory/SetExpanded.description: Sets whether the DCollapsibleCategory is expanded or not upon opening the container

DCollapsibleCategory/SetLabel.description: Sets the name of the DCollapsibleCategory.
